queries.overview_session_delay:
uberAgent_Session_SessionDetail_CL
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where SessionUser_s != "sys"
| where SessionUser_s contains "$User"
| where Computer contains "$Computer"
| extend delay = SessionInputDelaySumMs_d/SessionInputDelayCount_d
| summarize 
delay = percentile(delay,80),
SessionRpLatencyMs_d =  percentile(column_ifexists("SessionRpLatencyMs_d", 0),80)
by bin(TimeGenerated, $time_agg)
| extend session_delay = delay + SessionRpLatencyMs_d
| project-away delay, SessionRpLatencyMs_d
